snippet: China’s cabinet decided to continue the breaks for small and very small enterprises through 2016 and said it was considering significantly broadening them.
abstract: Chinese government announces modest package of economic stimulus measures, latest sign of concern by Beijing that growth may be slowing more than expected.
lead_paragraph: China’s cabinet decided to continue the breaks for small and very small enterprises through 2016 and said it was considering significantly broadening them.

headline.main: China Extends Tax Break Program to Spur Economy
headline.print_headline: China Extends Tax Break Program to Spur Economy
